## IDragStrategy.drag() method

Handles moving elements to the new location, and updating any visuals based on that (e.g connection previews for blocks).

**Signature:**

```typescript
drag(newLoc: Coordinate, e?: PointerEvent): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

newLoc


</td><td>

[Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md)


</td><td>

Workspace coordinate to which the draggable has been dragged.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

e


</td><td>

PointerEvent


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ PointerEvent that continued the drag. Can be used to check modifier keys, etc.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
